languages.text: {n}Считанные мгновения растягиваются в вечность: опора уходит из-под ног, сердце останавливает свой бой, прорва внизу, кажется, вздымается навстречу, чтобы поглотить вас... а затем когтистые пальцы хватают вас за запястье, останавливая падение и заставляя вас повиснуть над пропастью. Хохот Маражая звенит от темного восторга, когда он наконец-то втягивает вас обратно в рейдер.{/n}

{n}The moments stretch into an eternity: your firm footing is swept out from under you, your heart stops beating entirely, the chasm below seems to rush up toward you, ready to swallow you whole... and then clawed fingers close around your wrist, halting your fall, but holding you suspended over the abyss. Marazhai's laughter rings with dark delight when he finally tugs you back into the raider.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Считанные мгновения растягиваются в вечность: опора уходит из-под ног, сердце останавливает свой бой, прорва внизу, кажется, вздымается навстречу, чтобы поглотить вас... а затем когтистые пальцы хватают вас за запястье, останавливая падение и заставляя вас повиснуть над пропастью. Хохот Маражая звенит от темного восторга, когда он наконец-то втягивает вас обратно в рейдер.{/n}

Marazhai's laughter rings with dark delight when he finally tugs you back into the raider.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那一瞬间仿佛永恒一般，你原本稳固的立足点顷刻崩塌，你的心脏彻底停止了跳动。脚下的深渊似乎朝你猛冲而来，随时准备将你吞没其中……随后，带着利爪的手指紧紧地抓住你的手腕，阻止你继续坠落，但却依然把你挂在这无底深渊之上。当玛拉斋终于把你拉回到掠袭者战机上时，他的笑声中充满了阴暗的喜悦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moments stretch into an eternity: your firm footing is swept out from under you, your heart stops beating entirely, the chasm below seems to rush up toward you, ready to swallow you whole... and then clawed fingers close around your wrist, halting your fall, but holding you suspended over the abyss. Marazhai's laughter rings with dark delight when he finally tugs you back into the raider.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那一瞬间仿佛永恒一般，你原本稳固的立足点顷刻崩塌，你的心脏彻底停止了跳动。脚下的深渊似乎朝你猛冲而来，随时准备将你吞没其中……随后，带着利爪的手指紧紧地抓住你的手腕，阻止你继续坠落，但却依然把你挂在这无底深渊之上。当玛拉斋终于把你拉回到掠袭者战机上时，他的笑声中充满了阴暗的喜悦。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}その瞬間は永遠のようだった。堅い足場が足元から崩れて、その瞬間完全に心臓が止まり、下の裂け目がこちらに勢いよく向かってくるように見えた。こちらを丸呑みする準備は万端だ…すると、爪の鋭い指が手首に巻つき、落下を止めてあなたをそのまま掴む。深い穴の上に宙ぶらだ。マラズハイがついにあなたをレイダーに引き戻すと、彼の笑い声が暗い喜びとともに響きわたった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moments stretch into an eternity: your firm footing is swept out from under you, your heart stops beating entirely, the chasm below seems to rush up toward you, ready to swallow you whole... and then clawed fingers close around your wrist, halting your fall, but holding you suspended over the abyss. Marazhai's laughter rings with dark delight when he finally tugs you back into the raider.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その瞬間は永遠のようだった。堅い足場が足元から崩れて、その瞬間完全に心臓が止まり、下の裂け目がこちらに勢いよく向かってくるように見えた。こちらを丸呑みする準備は万端だ…すると、爪の鋭い指が手首に巻つき、落下を止めてあなたをそのまま掴む。深い穴の上に宙ぶらだ。マラズハイがついにあなたをレイダーに引き戻すと、彼の笑い声が暗い喜びとともに響きわたった。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los segundos se prolongan durante una eternidad: has perdido pie, te da un vuelco el corazón, el abismo se precipita hacia ti, dispuesto a engullirte... y justo en ese momento unos dedos como garras se cierran en torno a tu muñeca, deteniendo tu caída pero manteniéndote {mf|colgado|colgada} sobre el abismo. Marazhai suelta una carcajada siniestra y luego te iza de vuelta al incursor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moments stretch into an eternity: your firm footing is swept out from under you, your heart stops beating entirely, the chasm below seems to rush up toward you, ready to swallow you whole... and then clawed fingers close around your wrist, halting your fall, but holding you suspended over the abyss. Marazhai's laughter rings with dark delight when he finally tugs you back into the raider.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los segundos se prolongan durante una eternidad: has perdido pie, te da un vuelco el corazón, el abismo se precipita hacia ti, dispuesto a engullirte... y justo en ese momento unos dedos como garras se cierran en torno a tu muñeca, deteniendo tu caída pero manteniéndote {mf|colgado|colgada} sobre el abismo. Marazhai suelta una carcajada siniestra y luego te iza de vuelta al incursor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ce bref instant s'étire à n'en plus finir : vous perdez pied et votre cœur cesse de battre alors que le vide béant semble vous attirer à lui, prêt à vous engloutir tout {mf|entier|entière}... puis des doigts griffus se referment sur votre poignet et interrompent votre chute pour vous maintenir {mf|suspendu|suspendue} au-dessus de l'abîme. Quand il se décide enfin à vous ramener à l'intérieur du vaisseau, Marazhai éclate d'un rire sadique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moments stretch into an eternity: your firm footing is swept out from under you, your heart stops beating entirely, the chasm below seems to rush up toward you, ready to swallow you whole... and then clawed fingers close around your wrist, halting your fall, but holding you suspended over the abyss. Marazhai's laughter rings with dark delight when he finally tugs you back into the raider.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ce bref instant s'étire à n'en plus finir : vous perdez pied et votre cœur cesse de battre alors que le vide béant semble vous attirer à lui, prêt à vous engloutir tout {mf|entier|entière}... puis des doigts griffus se referment sur votre poignet et interrompent votre chute pour vous maintenir {mf|suspendu|suspendue} au-dessus de l'abîme. Quand il se décide enfin à vous ramener à l'intérieur du vaisseau, Marazhai éclate d'un rire sadique.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Augenblick zieht sich bis in alle Ewigkeit: Dir wird wortwörtlich der Boden unter den Füßen weggezogen, dein Herz hört komplett auf zu schlagen, der Abgrund unter dir scheint auf dich zuzurasen, bereit, dich vollständig zu verschlingen ... plötzlich greifen bekrallte Finger nach deinem Handgelenk, verhindern deinen Sturz und lassen sich über dem Abgrund baumeln. Marazhais Lachen versprüht dunkle Freude, als er dich wieder zurück in den Raider zieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moments stretch into an eternity: your firm footing is swept out from under you, your heart stops beating entirely, the chasm below seems to rush up toward you, ready to swallow you whole... and then clawed fingers close around your wrist, halting your fall, but holding you suspended over the abyss. Marazhai's laughter rings with dark delight when he finally tugs you back into the raider.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Augenblick zieht sich bis in alle Ewigkeit: Dir wird wortwörtlich der Boden unter den Füßen weggezogen, dein Herz hört komplett auf zu schlagen, der Abgrund unter dir scheint auf dich zuzurasen, bereit, dich vollständig zu verschlingen ... plötzlich greifen bekrallte Finger nach deinem Handgelenk, verhindern deinen Sturz und lassen sich über dem Abgrund baumeln. Marazhais Lachen versprüht dunkle Freude, als er dich wieder zurück in den Raider zieht.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Saniyeler sonsuzluğa dönüşüyor. Üzerinde durduğun sağlam zemin, ayaklarının altından çekiliyor. Kalbin atmayı tamamen bırakıyor. Altında uzanan yarık, seni yutmaya hazır hâlde sana doğru hücuma geçiyormuş gibi duruyor. Ardından bileğini kavrayan pençeli parmaklar, düşüşüne engel olsa da uçurumun üzerinde seni asılı tutuyor. Marazhai en nihayetinde seni baskıncıya geri çekerken kahkahası, karanlık bir hazla çınlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moments stretch into an eternity: your firm footing is swept out from under you, your heart stops beating entirely, the chasm below seems to rush up toward you, ready to swallow you whole... and then clawed fingers close around your wrist, halting your fall, but holding you suspended over the abyss. Marazhai's laughter rings with dark delight when he finally tugs you back into the raider.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Saniyeler sonsuzluğa dönüşüyor. Üzerinde durduğun sağlam zemin, ayaklarının altından çekiliyor. Kalbin atmayı tamamen bırakıyor. Altında uzanan yarık, seni yutmaya hazır bir hâlde sana doğru hücuma geçiyor gibi duruyor. Ardından bileğini kavrayan pençeli parmaklar, düşüşüne engel olsa da uçurumun üzerinde seni asılı tutuyor. Marazhai'ın kahkahası, en nihayetinde seni baskıncıya geri çekerken karanlık bir hazla çınlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
